name: Arun
wishText: May your passion, enthusiasm, and kindess continue to inspire those around you.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
letterText:
Dear Arun,

Wishing you a wonderful birthday filled with joy, laughter, and unforgettable moments. May this year bring you closer to your dreams and surround you with love and happiness. You are truly special, and I am grateful to have you as my buissness partner and my friend.

Happy Birthday!

â€” Theo
